info.title: API Pandora FMS
info.description:
This is the new API framework for Pandora FMS.

The old API is deprecated but still functional, and not all old endpoints are supported in the new API, but new endpoints will be added in each release.

Using this web interface, you can play around and see how it works each endpoint interactively.

More useful links: * Pandora FMS Licence * Pandora FMS Official Support * Pandora FMS Community * Vulnerability Disclosure Policy * Pandora FMS FAQ

post.summary: Creates a new field into events comments

delete.summary: Delete comment for event type object.

validity.description: Date until which tocken is valid, if it is void it will never expire

severity.description: Event severity, the available severity are: maintenance, informational, normal, warning, critical, minor, major

status.description: Event status, the available status are: all, new, validated, inprocess, not_validated, not_in_process

eventType.description: Event status, the available status are: going_unknown, unknown, alert_fired, alert_recovered, alert_ceased, alert_manual_validation, recon_host_detected, system, error, new_agent, going_up_critical, going_down_critical, going_up_warning, going_down_warning, going_up_normal, going_down_normal, configuration_change, ncm

search.description: Search in fields id, event, extraId, source and custom_data

groupBy.description: Event filter group by, the available group by are: all, events, agents, extra_ids

filterOnlyAlert.description: Event filter event by, the available filter are: all, filter_alert_events, only_alert_events

customDataFilterType.description: Event filter event by, the available filter are: all, filter_alert_events, only_alert_events

maxAgents.description: Maximum number of agents per group

oldPassword.description: Only administrator users will not have to confirm the old password

language.description: User section, the available sections are: default, visual_console, event_list, group_view, group_view, tactical_view, alert_detail, external_link, other, dashboard

section.description: User section, the available sections are: default, visual_console, event_list, group_view, group_view, tactical_view, alert_detail, external_link, other, dashboard

metaconsoleSection.description: User Metaconsole section, the available sections are: default, visual_console, event_list, group_view, group_view, tactical_view, alert_detail, external_link, other, dashboard

forceChangePass.description: Force the user to change the password on next login

failedAttempt.description: Number of failed login attempts by a user

notLogin.description: The user with no access authorization can only access the API.

localUser.description: The user with local authentication enabled will always use local authentication.

idFilter.description: Assign a specific filter for user

sessionTime.description: This is defined in minutes. If you want a permanent session, introduce -1 in this field.

defaultEventFilter.description: Assign a specific filter in events for user

metaconsoleDefaultEventFilter.description: Assign a specific filter in events for user metaconsole

timeAutorefresh.description: Interval of autorefresh of the elements, by default they are 30 seconds, needing to enable the autorefresh first

ehorusUserLevelUser.description: user access ehorus whit user name

ehorusUserLevelPass.description: user access ehorus whit user token

itsmUserLevelUser.description: user access ITSM whit user name

itsmUserLevelPass.description: user access ITSM whit user token

freeSearch.description: Find word in fullname and comments fields.

tags.description: Tags to which a user belongs
